\begin{enumerate}
\item Let $X$ and $Y$ be continuous real-valued random variables. Prove the following:
\begin{enumerate}
\item $E\left[ E\left[X|Y \right]\right] = E\left[ X\right]$
\item $Var(X) = E\left[Var(X|Y) \right] + Var(E\left[ X|Y\right])$
\end{enumerate}

\item
\end{enumerate}
